CP- 506 Smoke and acoustic sealant Low-shrinkage and paintable smoke and acoustic sealant ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Sealants, sprays and coatings- - - ### FEATURES:Features Low shrinkage (< 25%) according to ASTM C 1241 Soft foil packaging – reduces waste compared to hard cartridges Applications Sealing construction joints and through-penetration openings in non fire-rated acoustic barriers and smoke partitions ### TECHNICAL DATA: Chemical basis: Water-based acrylic dispersion Color: White Shelf life: 24 Months Technical Data | Chemical basis | Water-based acrylic dispersion | Color | White | Shelf life | 24 Months | 1 | Acoustics performance | Test report available | Movement | ±12.5% (ISO 11600) | Surface burning characteristics UL 723 (ASTM E84) | Flame spread: 10
Smoke development: 10 | Product Class | Ultimate | Tested in accordance with | UL 2079 (L-rating only), ASTM E84, ASTM G21, ASTM E90 | Application temperature range | 35 - 104 °F | Storage and transportation temperature range | 35 - 95 °F | Temperature resistance range | -4 - 176 °F | Can be painted | Yes | Base materials | Concrete, Drywall, Masonry, Metal | at 77°F/25°C and 50% relative humidity; from date of manufacture ### ITEMS- 412591 - Sealant CP 506 SA 5 gal pail - Package Size 1 pc - 3549663 - CP 506 5 Gallon Pails Pallet - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 18x Sealant CP 506 SA 5 gal pail
